actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act for the purpose of prohibiting the use of the chemical dibromochloropropane.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to prohibit the distribution, sale, shipment, manufacture, or use of the chemical dibromochloropropane.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act for the purpose of prohibiting the use of the chemical dibromochloropropane.
